data.title: Brown Bag Seafood Co.
data.meta_description: Fresh Ingredients. Quality Seafood. Made To Order. Quickly Prepared.
data.text:
When did you join the Brown Bag team?

About May 2011 - 3 years before we opened for business!

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Salmon Veggiebox, with a little bit of tartar sauce in the corner.

What's your favorite part of your job?

Creating new things and watching them come to life. Optimizing what we already do. Hanging out and collaborating with a bunch of hilarious, quirky and committed people.

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Evanston, IL | Eating in the bath. | My besties and my bro.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

June 2016.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Curry Fish Cakes Greens & Grains (gotta have the creamy ginger!).

What's your favorite part of your job?

Optimizing our guests' experience and participating in the collaboration as I watch other ideas come to life. Watching a crew member learning something new and seeing their pure joy and excitement is pretty cool too!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Davenport, IA | Pasta, a glass of red wine, and a rom com. | Derek Jeter, Anthony Bourdain, Joanna Gaines.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

July 2018.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Salmon Salad with garlic bread.

What's your favorite part of your job?

Honestly, talking about Brown Bag! It surprises me when I meet someone who hasn't come by one of our locations! Our food is absolutely delicious, sustainable and delightfully tasty!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Port Jarvis, NY | Drumstick ice cream cones. | My sisters and my dad.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

June 2022.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Fish & Chips.

What's your favorite part of your job?

The teamwork environment.

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Atlanta, GA | Pasta | All of my close friends who live out of state! It's been 5-15 years since I've seen some of them. It would be cool to have them all in the same room.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

June 2017.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Our Seasonal Spicy Shrimp Gumbo from winter 2018!

What's your favorite part of your job?

The interactions with the guests and the team! We get to be up close and personal with guests and also build a bond that brings us close as a team. I love it!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Chicago, IL | Singing my heart out while driving! | Martin Luther King, Bob Marley, Tupac Shakur (3 different ways to master peace!).

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

September 2019.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Because I'm a little extra...a Grilled Chicken sando using the lobster roll bun with sauteed pickled red onions and chipotle-tartar.

What's your favorite part of your job?

Interacting with our guests! We have so many interesting people come through our doors and I love hearing how much they love our food...not to mention I can get a quick dance move out!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Chicago, IL | Playing my game. | Lil Uzi Vert, Seth Rogen, Monkey D. Luffy.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

June 2022.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

I love all the food but my favorites are the Lobster Roll and Grilled Shrimp Powerbox.

What's your favorite part of your job?

Putting smiles on our guests' faces and working with my team as we develop and help one another excel.

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Linden, TN | Strawberry cheesecake. | Rosa Parks, Harriet Tubman, Ellen Degeneres, Mary J. Blige and Donesha Fox (my trainer!).

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

July 2023.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Definitely a Curry Fish Cakes Greens & Grains with a Mini Chowdah!

What's your favorite part of your job?

My team! It's such a great and joyous environment. We all love what we do and love spreading that joy to our guests.

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Chicago, IL | Binge watching 90 Day Fiancé. | Naomi Campbell and my 4 siblings. Ain't no party like a Tolbert party.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

April 2024.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Chowdah all day every day!

What's your favorite part of your job?

The team! (The food goes without saying.)

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Kent, England | Just keep chocolate away from me. | Oh man, a lot of jazz musicians. From Wes Montgomery to Herbie Hancock, from Casiopea to Luiz Bonfá, from Animals as Leaders to Eberhard Weber, everyone’s invited! I don’t have enough time or space to list everyone!

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

July 2021.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Lake Superior Whitefish Greens & Grains with a little extra lemon vinaigrette and a side of Spicy Cauliflower!

What's your favorite part of your job?

Lots to choose from. Having a good and supportive team and having fun while we put smiles on our guests' faces by the time they walk out of the restaurant!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Spirit Animal? | Dinner Party Guests?

Warsaw, IN | A bird, any bird! | Jennifer Lopez, Tiffany Haddish, Alyssa Edwards and my best friends!

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

June 2024.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Mega Protein Powerbox!

What's your favorite part of your job?

The people! And being able to serve great food..

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Lisle, IL | Fried foods | My late grandma, and mom so we could share some laughs and good food.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

August 2023.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Chowdah with Tots, or our seasonal Pepperjack Shrimp & Grits.

What's your favorite part of your job?

Interacting with guests and just being around the Brown Bag family. Finding ways to grow and bond is important and I look forward to every day with my team!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Atlanta, GA | My sweet tooth! Must haves are my Reese's and Oreos | Eddie Murphy, Prince and Donna Lee

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

May 2024.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

The TACOS!!!!

What's your favorite part of your job?

Guest interaction and the vibe of our restaurant..

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Chicago, IL | Chocolate!!! | The entire Brown Bag family & Cardi B!

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

August 2022.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

The Lobster Roll.

What's your favorite part of your job?

Interacting with our guests and making sure their experiences are positive and memorable.

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Royston, GA | Pasta | Patti Labelle, Whitney Houston, Fantasia, Leandria Johnson, Kelonte Gavin.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

August 2022.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Salmon Greens & Grains!!

What's your favorite part of your job?

Bring TRUE to myself and making my team happy because I love them dearly. Keeping smiles on their faces keeps me going!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Augusta, GA | MUSIC ALL DAY EVERYDAY! | My BB crew and my friends and family!

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

May 2023.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

Grilled catch & grilled shrimp quesadilla (off menu!).

What's your favorite part of your job?

Making new friends, and working on being less nerdy every day! Solving problems and being a ninja!

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Chicago, IL | Toonami | Jet Li, Jackie Chan, Anderson Silva, MF DOOM, The Undertaker and Tony Ferguson.

When did you join the Brown Bag team?

May 2024.

What's your favorite meal at Brown Bag?

So far, the Fish & Chips. I plan to venture out as everything is so good!

What's your favorite part of your job?

The atmosphere and the people. Everyone is so helpful and I feel the "teamwork makes the dream work" vibe. I love that.

Quick Hits: Hometown? | Guilty Pleasure? | Dinner Party Guests?

Charlotte, NC | Cartoons and Legos | Belive it or not, my granny. She is 91, but a lot of fun; my sister, who is my best friend; my dad, who inspires me; I'd really invite my whole family because we're so close. And, Taylor Swift and Russell Dickerson
